Articles.Content: Since I upgraded to 1.0.5 my aircrafts have started suffering from asymmetric flame-outs again. Have anyone else experienced this?
It sometimes happened even in 1.0.4 in my case, welp.

There is a discussion on this over here.

Apparently, if you don't build with enough intake for the engines it will flame out asymmetrically as air runs low, however if you simply climb to an altitude where the intakes/engines can no longer function even if you do have enough intakes, it will not.

So the answer is simple, don't skimp on the intakes and make sure you are using appropriate super sonic intakes because they now have a functional curve where some will bring in more air at low speed and some will bring in more air at high speed.

Edited November 11, 2015 by Alshain
